properties.body:
1. NORTH AMERICAN ICE SERVICE (NAIS)
   ICEBERG BULLETIN 040001Z MAY.
2. ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING
   47-00N 055-20W, 45-55N 053-20W,
   45-15N 044-00W, 46-45N 043-15W,
   54-05N 050-00W.
3. ESTIMATED ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG
   TRACKLINE JOINING
   54-05N 050-00W, 57-30N 051-20W,
   56-10N 047-40W, 56-50N 043-10W,
   58-20N 040-50W, 62-20N 038-50W,
   64-50N 030-10W.
4. WESTERN ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINE
   JOINING
   50-15N 061-11W, 48-04N 058-57W.
5. SEA ICE LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINES
   JOINING:
   A. 48-41N 067-57W, 50-01N 066-07W,
      49-55N 062-10W, 49-01N 061-05W,
      49-50N 057-52W.
   B. 49-33N 055-10W, 53-00N 052-15W,
      54-45N 052-00W, 55-45N 055-30W,
      58-03N 058-18W, 60-24N 057-03W.
   C. 62-25N 041-11W, 60-13N 042-16W,
      59-16N 043-53W, 59-27N 046-06W,
      60-28N 047-42W, 60-39N 046-23W.
6. MOST RECENT RECONNAISSANCE:
   WESTERN LIMIT SATELLITE PASS 03 MAY 22.
7. REPORT POSITION AND TIME OF ANY ICEBERGS
   SEA ICE OR STATIONARY RADAR TARGETS THAT
   MAY LIKELY BE ICE TO THE NEAREST CANADIAN
   COAST GUARD MARINE COMMUNICATIONS AND
   TRAFFIC SERVICE STATION OR
   USING INMARSAT CODE 42.
8. FOR MORE REPORTING INFORMATION OR TO
   DOWNLOAD SHAPEFILES AND WEEKLY PREDICTIONS,
   GO TO WWW.NAVCEN.USCG.GOV/IIP.
9. CANCEL THIS MSG 050001Z MAY 22.
